channel.title: Timely Transports on Pandaqi Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Timely Transports on Pandaqi Blog

item.title: Timely Transports: v2 Update
item.description: Alright, half a year ago I published my “hybrid” boardgame called Timely Transports The game was a huge hit during my playtests, and I can say that this was one of the first projects were I really felt things were coming together, and the result was a clean and fun game.
